duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead agile ceremonies and coach scrum teams on Agile best practices and principles.
Facilitate discussions, resolve team impediments, and support teams' self-organization and agile methodology knowledge growth.
Use tools and techniques to support the team in shipping high-quality software increments and maintain metrics for stakeholder visibility.
Manage projects impacting the scrum team and communicate delivery times and scope to other software engineering teams.
Identify and manage issues and risks, and communicate team and project status and schedule updates.
Anticipate working with teams on East or West Coast hours, with flexibility to work outside of regular office hours.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Digital Program Management, Software Application Development, or related field (Master's preferred)
